directions: [["Combine all of the salad ingredients in a big bowl. "],["In a separate bowl, whisk together the dressing ingredients. Pour the dressing over the salad ingredients and stir until everything is mixed well. "],["Refrigerate until serving or at least for a half an hour to let the flavors blend. "],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
